title: 2015 AFL season: Hawthorn v Richmond, live coverage of Round 18 | The
text:
BRETT Deledio sparked Richmond with the first three goals of the game to lead Hawthorn by 15 points at quarter time.
Richmond dominated possession in the opening term and held the Hawks goalless to lead, 3.0 (18) to 0.3 (3).
FOR FULL LIVE HQ COVERAGE WITH SUPERCOACH SCORES TAP ON THE GAME IN THE SCORE CENTRE ABOVE OR HERE IF YOU ARE ON A MOBILE DEVICE
Dustin Martin was the leading possession winner in the ground with 10.
Billy Hartung and Sam Lloyd are the starting substitutes.
FOLLOW THE ACTION FROM THE MCG IN OUR LIVE BLOG:
LIVE: Hawks v Tigers (Frame content direct link: http://embed.scribblelive.com/Embed/v7.aspx?Id=1407675&ThemeId=16707 .)
Originally published as Live AFL: Tigers make bright start
